summary: Added a new village, with a merchant, player home and an inn!
descriptionHtml:
Note: The mod has a crash bug and I don\'t know how to fix it. I\'m sorry. The mod is dead now.

 << Colonia >>
 A new village east of Rorikstead, with a merchant, a blacksmith, player home and an inn! Easy to find too!
Town contains: Augustus Inn
                      Player\'s Home
                      Blacksmith
                      and an merchant who sells blacksmith items at the market.

Please send me suggestions and bugs, this is my first mod.
Note: I am working to improve this.... New versions will come :)
author: TigerHeartXx
